content: a simple useful pattern for using up remnants of fun fur that ahem unaccountably turn up in your stash now available for kindle 1 unfortunately not free - i m just practising e-publishing with this one decrease 2008 note from designer the following error has been corrected in the updated pattern which is available now in the us section of the pattern where it reads chain 2 then 2 double_crochet into each double_crochet around it should read chain 2 then 2 double_crochet into each single_crochet around 1 http //www amazon co uk/hair-scrunchies-ebook/dp/b006nkh5ou/ref=sr_1_2 s=digital-text&ie=utf8&qid=1324244589&sr=1-2
